title: How to add an expo to an existing project - Quora

response.answer_text: What is an “expo” and why do you want to add it, and what is a “project”? I have a couple dozen projects, some of which are done in a 3D drawing system, some of which are written in Java, some of which are written in Python, a couple of which are written in English (they are called “novels”). I’m not sure what an expo is, and even if I did, I don’t see how it applies to totally diverse projects.
